quotes.message: Feminism is something you do. It's a verb. It's what you are. It's an activity; it's something you're actively engaged in.
quotes.name: Kathleen Hanna

quotes.message: Feminism is equality: politically; culturally; socially; economically. That's it, that simple.

quotes.message: Feminism was about making women's lives less constrained and giving them more choices.

quotes.message: Feminism is the radical notion that women are human beings.

quotes.message: Feminism has never been about getting a job for one woman. It's about making life more fair for women everywhere. It's not about a piece of the existing pie; there are too many of us for that. It's about baking a new pie.

quotes.message: Feminism means to me being comfortable with who you are as a woman and being unapologetic about it.

quotes.message: Feminism isn't called the longest revolution for nothing.

quotes.message: here's nothing bad about feminism. We have to help each other, because there's a lot of women in the world who are suffering because the fact is we're not equal. It's as plain as that. It's still a men's world. I don't know. We'll go on with it.

quotes.message: Feminism is a political mistake. Feminism is a mistake made by women's intellect, a mistake which her instinct will recognize.

quotes.message: Feminism is not just about women; it's about letting all people lead fuller lives.
